cardContent.initHelperText: Here is some brief introduction about CV of yourself, which contains Education background, Hobbies and Interests, and Favorite quote.

cardContent.helperText: You can add, edit or delete your education background details here. And you can have at most 3 education background details in total.
You can add, edit or delete your work experience details here. And you can have at most 3 work experience details in total.
You can add, edit or delete your hobbies and interests details here. And you can have at most 2 hobbies and interests details in total.
You can add, edit or delete your favorite quote details here. And you can have at most 1 favorite quote details in total.
